content.detailedDescription:
I was travelling southbound on the a34 from oxford (uk) in the direction of newbury when i saw a bright white light appear from my right (the west), move steadily over both carridgeways to my left (the east) and once over a small line of trees which run along the length of the "a" road, it disappeared.

the opposite side of the tree line were fields.  the weather was cold and clear.  there were no bridges nearby and no other sources of light.  when i saw the light, it appeared out of place for the setting.

the light appeared to be about 3mm wide and at a distance of about 100 meters infront of me.  i had a clear, unobstructed view.

my instant thought was "what the hell is that?!" and i watched for about 5 seconds as it crossed all 4 lanes of the road before disappearing about the trees to my left.  i had an unobstructed view of open space beyond the trees and there was no trace of the object once it disappeared above the trees.

i double checked there were no street lights or bridges in the area i had seen the light and there wasnt anything in the area.
content.summary: 3mm sized white light about 100 meters to my front, travelled from my right to left then vanished above freesat side of "a" road.

content.detailedDescription: Some dark grey to black coloured objects were observed appearing, congregating in random shaped groups, becoming more visible (darker) then either moving away or fading away from sight. they were observed by 3 people for around half an hour and i took a few snaps on my iphone. i took a couple using hdr (with normal on) as well, and found the objects had moved slightly in those consecutive frames! a jet had passed over as well and my husband took photos of the vapour trail that revealed a couple more, which weren’t noticed when the photos were taken, only after when i reviewed the images. it was as if they were using the cloud cover to hide in.  prior to taking the photos larger groups had been seen, some as low in the view as between and just above the treeline.  however i believe they were some distance away and definitely would have been over the sea. as dawn became brighter i could no longer see any ‘dots’.
content.summary: Some dark objects observed from hastings victoria at dawn.

content.detailedDescription: I saw two dark triangles 500 meters above my head as soon as i saw them i remember that i was cursing i thought that the shitty americans were trying their vehicles ... then in a few seconds the leaders were gliding and it was impossible they were too huge and they were 6 meters thick they had to stall their engines were 3 white spherical lights but they were made of electricity and did not emit noise lasted 30 seconds and then on the back while pointing towards switzerland i noticed of the square windows 2 rows of 8 light windows normal neon house and suddenly hemisphere an electric blue flash and disappeared i was shocked in front of them there was a mountain of 3000meters and even today i do not know if they are teleported or so i only know that they were not humanly conceivable
content.summary: Two black triangol perfect

content.detailedDescription: This photo was taken at shingletown california dec 2017
content.summary: See photo

content.detailedDescription:
While on a casual morning drive in a rural area very close to where i lived, i spotted what seemed to be thousands of canadian and snow geese spiraling above a lake just a few hundred yards off the blacktop i was traveling on. i remember thinking how awesome the sight was as it resembled a large vortex over the water. so i decided to pull over to the roadside and take a few photos with my phone. i walked around to the passenger side of my pickup and held my phone up and focused on the lake and geese. the instant i pressed the touch screen to capture the image, i saw a blip, or black flash out of the corner of my left eye. i remember having a strange sensation so i, in an almost frantic fashion, got back into my pickup and drove off. i didnt look at the photo i took for several hours afterward. not because i didnt want to but because it seemed to have no importance compared to that of the "blip". but then i looked and saw what i could not explain. i had captured on film a ufo. i have showed my photo of whatever it is to several people who have provided many different explanations but none of which are acceptable to me. i do not know what the object was. i know it was there and gone in a flash. i know it was in the sky using some form of flight and propulsion i am not aware of and i know it scared me a little. whiteman airforce base is located just to the west of where the photo was taken. maybe they hold the ruanswer. 

thank you!
content.summary: Unintentional capturing of image on my phone while taking photo of geese. saw a black blip the instant i took the photo.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a beam coming from clouds. i took a picture of the clouds and only later, upon looking at the photos, i noticed that there are ufos in the pictures. these pictures were taken on my cell phone while in my car.
content.summary: I saw a beam in the clouds and a disc shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were going west on highway 24 from peyton to falcon, when we saw strange lights moving quickly through the sky near cheyenne mountain. the were several that were small lights with tails the broke into two. one went behind the mountain and the came back the opposite direction.
the largest one i first saw was a teardrop shape. it changed shape a few times and the stopped falling and took the shape like a brick, but hovered over the mountains. it glowed brighter as changed into the brick shape. the video is grainy and shows how badly i need to get my windsheild replaced, but if you look for the bright lights, it's a decent capture of what we saw. we don't know what happened to them. by the time we came out of the store, the lights were all gone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Thought it was asteroids until it changed from teardrop shape to brick and hovered and glowed brighter.

content.detailedDescription:
Je fumais une cigarette le 24/12
g lã¨ve les yeux jais dâ€™abord observã© une boule lumineuse qui câ€™est ã©vaporã© 
puis g levã©e les yeux direction au sud au dessus des maisons dans le ciels 6 boules orange rouge  qui bouge qui se suivent pendant environ 10 minute puit de son ã©vaporã© le lendemain le 25/12 je sortã© je levã©e les yeux vers 22h15 et lã  au sud dans le ciel 7 boules orange  rouge dans le ciel ki câ€™est mis ã  bouger puit et rester stationnaire pendant environ 15minute puits câ€™est ã©vaporã© ciel dã©gagã© aucun avion aucun bruit jâ€™ai ã©tã© terrifiã© je nâ€™ai jamais vu sa et deux soir deux suite le 24/12 et le 25/12 tã©moins moi ma maman et mon conjoint nous habitons un lieux en hauteur donc ciel dã©gagã©
content.summary: Apparition de lumiã¨re dans le ciel

content.detailedDescription:
Hi there, 

it was a very hot day in buenos aires, me and my wife went out to the roof to lay down, she was with her phone i was just watching orions belt and sirius, all of a sudden i saw what i thought first a group of bright stars moving together, that was my first thought than i realised that it was not. i was laying down i told my wife to look, we both jumped and run to the other side of the roof to follow it,it was coming from east and heading west very silent, very low and very low speed, i worked in airlines before and i am an aviation enthusiast, there is no way that this object was an airplane or any other thing that i know. it was transparent and had lights down i am not sure if it had like 5 or 7 lights, when i first saw it the lights were very visible and strong than it reduced the light to 1/4 i would say, than i lost vision of it behind a tall building.
i kept telling my wife did you see that ? 

another thing i did immediately after it disappeared is checking flight radar website to see if there were any plane flying around that area at that time i could not find any, which means that thing was not captured by the radar,
flight radar is very accurate i use it all the time.

if anybody saw that too i hope that they will report it.
content.summary: Triangular unidentified flying object

content.detailedDescription:
Laying on hammock in my yard with eyes closed. opened my eyes after seeing a vision of a craft. a craft was heading away from direction of the sun when i first saw it. shaped oval or like kidney bean or football. varies in photos i took. 
i thought wow that's awesome i just had a vision and there is a craft! i got my phone and took some pictures. in last picture of first craft it appeared to have been sucked in or traveled up into a beam of light which came from very high in the sky to the northwest. the sun was lower in southwest sky. i didn't see it vanish. it just vanished. the picture of the beams of light from opposite direction of sun is why i consider it possible it traveled in the light. i don't know or state that as definite fact. 

4 minutes later a second craft followed it in pursuit of conjunction. it may have been a small jet or a rocket. i photographed that also. 

2 days later i had an abduction experience and ended up in the er on october 23 in exeter nh. had  bite marks of unknown origin on lower abdomen which are consistent in location with the immense pain i felt during the abduction which took place between 3-4:00 am on the 22nd of october. it was absolutely the most painful and upsetting abduction or encounter i have ever had. 
a cat scan was performed to ensure no life threatening injury to abdomen. 
the bite mark was noted but no ointment or medical care was provided to the location of external injury. saline and pain medicines were administered at hospital. superficial burn was on my neck, posterior and inferior to right ear. 
 this was not the first time i'd been at the er after an abduction and had a fever and unexplainable wounds with recollection of the abduction event. 
october 20, 2016 (accurate within a day) after 5 days of feeling very sick i went to er. the date of the visit to et was approximately 5 days after that abduction. was the last time i'm certain the abduction was the cause of the injuries and fever and pain/sick feeling. 
my body has become sensitive, my skin is sensitive to sun and wind and my body doesn't regulate body temperature very well. i have a fan on me at least 20 hours a day. otherwise i get hot and begin sweating. .  

i'll send the photos separately. 
i posted them and then decided to take them down due to terms of use. 
the photos are available for you to view but i'd rather reserve the rights to my photographs
content.summary: Headed from direction of sun, glided and slowed, ascended and descended, vanished. then second one came. in pursuit or companion to first 4 minutes after first one.

content.detailedDescription: I observed this strange object here in orlando, fl today. i had to zoom in so much with my phone, that it's distorted. it looked to have lights flashing on it. the sun was in my face, so it was off screen for a bit. i'm so disappointed in this!! i've trimmed the video and slowed it down. once it goes off screen, speed it up to 3:03. what do you think it is? it was moving way to slow for an airplane and was too high for a helicopter.
content.summary: Shiny object too slow to be airplane, too high to be helicopter

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home the evening of thursday, december 21, 2017 coming off of rt. 33 north to leighton exit and was struck by how bright a star was (there were two stars next to each other but one was brighter than the other).  i thought they were stars since they were not moving, i looked to see where the moon was and it was on the opposite side from them.  as i was staring up at the brightest of the two stars the one to the right which was the very bright one started to dip or so that i could actually see the shape which was a fat triangle with rounded tips to the triangle instead of points.  as i was watching this still trying to decipher what i was actually viewing (and it wasn't a plane not moving just a second of dip to see shape) it dipped to the other side then upright again.  as it dipped for a few seconds i saw the underside to have three large circle of lights at each rounded tip.  i then had to keep driving so i don't know what happened after that.  it was not moving at all and was definitely very bright like a star but dipped and swayed to show shape of a fat triangle with rounded tips and at each tip circular set of lights.  i felt that i looked for anything that it could be and it didn't fit any of those things -- not a plane, not a star, not a shooting star, not the moon
content.summary: Driving home evening saw bright star that started to dip and sway but not move -- had lights under it shape of fat triangle with round circle of lights

content.detailedDescription: Traveling northbound on mountain ave and observed 4 strobe like lights appear in the sky. they were each equidistant from one another and spanned the night sky. probably a mile or so. they flashed together in unison about 3 times and as soon as they appeared out of nowhere, they disappeared. no change in direction.
content.summary: Lights

content.detailedDescription:
Je sortais le chien. le ciel ã©tait dã©gagã©, on voyait bien les ã©toiles cette nuit lã ... c'est lã  que j'ai aperã§u une grosse boule orange, aussi lumineuse qu'une ã©toile (voire mãªme plus) et plus gros ã©galement. cela se dã©plaã§ait plus vite et plus haut qu'un avion, mais moins vite et moins haut qu'une ã©toile filante. il ã©tait aux alentours de minuit, dans la nuit du 24 au 25 dã©cembre.. j'ai mãªme pensã©, "tiens, c'est peut ãªtre le pã¨re noã«l" j'ã©tais tellement surprise et obnubilã©e par cette belle apparition que je n'est mãªme pas pensã© ã  filmer ou prendre une photo.
quand j'ai rentrã© le chien ã  la maison quelques minutes plus tard, j'ai dit ã  ma soeur : "tu vas me prendre pour une folle, moi mãªme je me prends pour une folle : j'ai vu un ovni.."
content.summary: Boule lumineuse orange plus grosse et plus haute qu'un avion se dã©plaã§ant dans le ciel

content.detailedDescription:
December 23rd, 2017:los angeles

a single large red light flew upward, amidst the normal lax traffic, towards the moon. once it got into position, it stopped and just sat there in one position for a good 10 minutes. during this time it was mostly this really deep bright red, but would turn green for a few seconds every now and then, and sometimes it would just turn completely off(disappear). then in the course of about 3 seconds it went from the full stopped position to a position countless miles away, then stopped on a dime. mind you, it did not just go out and appear miles away, nor did it accelerate and de-celerate, you just see this red dot just  kind of casually travel this large distance with ease, then come to a complete stop.  it then travelled all the way across the horizon in the other direction descending and moving horizontally in funky patterns. it is kind of hard to describe this last part.
content.summary: Red light ascended above moon, waited 10 minutes while changing colors, then defied the laws of newtonian physics

content.detailedDescription: Noticed something way up in the sky.  it reflected the light of the sun.  it moved slow and in different directions.  i came inside the house and brought my camera out.  i used a 300mm lens.  but when i attempted to zoom in on it,  it would disappear in my view finder.  the shape was more like a paper airplane,  but the photo's i took appear to be an orb.....?????  our reaction was,  "i think we are wittnessing a ufo.  then some other people came over to see and watch it.  so a total of 5 wittnesses.
content.summary: Was flying drones,  and  we both noticed something in the sky way above our drones,  it was moving slow and kept changing directions,  west to east,  south to north.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dogs and wanted to see orion’s belt and there was this large star, twice the size of venus.  just figured out where it was and like to see it.  i guess i had too many lights on so not too many stars were out but when i looked for orion’s belt there was this light in the sky.  so i watched it for a while to see if it was moving and it was but slowly.  a little big for a satellite but i thought i would take out my phone and check the app that shows that and when i took the phone to point to it, it was gone.  so i didn’t get to see it leave.  just a white light much bigger than anything else in the sky except for the moon.  no red or another color lights coming from it.     i go out at that time most nights give or take a few minutes.
content.summary: Saw a bright light in the sky, moved slowly twice the size of venus.  looked to see what satellite it was with an app then looked up and it was gone. i was looking for orion's belt and saw it in that area

content.detailedDescription:
J'ã©tais sur un balcon ã  vedã¨ne et j'ai vu deux lumiã¨res rouges/oranges dã©coller en direction d'avignon/montfavet se diriger vers moi j'ai penser ã  des hã©licoptã¨res car ã§a clignotait puis elles sont montã©es tout droit dans le ciel avant de disparaitre puis 2 autres ont suivis sous la mãªme forme et la 4eme ã  disparu avant la 3 ã  plus basse altitude.
je prã©cise que je ne bois pas et deux autres personnes ont ã©tã© tã©moins de la scã¨ne elles ã©taient avec moi sur le balcon.
content.summary: 4 lumiã¨res dã©collant dans le ciel

content.detailedDescription: Driving north to waterbury on i-84 connecticut, i observed what i first thought was an extremly bright star. the object then so quicly went east only a little bit. if i would guess the object was a mile or two miles north of exit 15, then it moved 5 inches left from my line of sight. id guess a football sized length, unsure because im unsure the size of object. then it moved east north east even more quickly until it disappeared behind the trees. this is my second ufo sighting, my second that ive reported this year to mufon although my first took place years ago. i have kept my eyes searching, my heart desperatly wanting to see what i saw years ago. i was not looking for a ufo, i thought at first it was a star until it moved in an impossible aerial manner for any man m.Ade flying vehicle. it was over before i could even grasp what i was seeing. i cant imagine that i was the only one who saw this as there were many cars on the highway and it was impossible to not notice while looking ahead, which was a straight part of highway at that point, which makes the objects turn not an illusion. there is an airport near by but given the movments i know it was not a plane. hopefully it came up on the radar for the airport. this event was not better then my first sighting of 3 objects, and so much shorter. i am so glad to have seen another. i hope that if anyone else saw this that they report it to validate my sighting. before i saw my first sighting, i thought ufo sightings were lies or delusions, but then i became a believer real quick, id sometimes see objects at first having hope its another ufo, only to be dissapointed and observing it as something identifiable, which only made me upset to tell the truth. but tonights was very amazing, not as much as my first sighting, which by searching im sure you can find my description of thhose objects, which is lengthy. to add ot my giddiness is the admission of the pentagons ufo program and release of the jet ufo chase off coast of san diego, which has made my hopes of disclosure boiling. bless what you guys do here and happy holidays. oh and whta i saw was not santa haha.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Observered bright star like object, mile north of exit 15 on i84. object rapidly turned west, then quickly went east

content.detailedDescription:
Ceci c est passã© en juillet 2016.

bonjours un truc ã©trange est apparu le vendredi 22 et samedi le 23 vers 1 hs du matin que je n'arrive pas ã  dã©mystifier et qui me rend perplexe.
vendredi. je sortais mon chien et j'ai vu ã  peu prã¨s ã  150-200 pieds de chez moi et ã  3 pieds du sol une lumiã¨re rouge au centre et plus pale ã  l'entoure comme rosã©. au loin, ã‡a devait avoir la grosseur d'une balle de tennis. je regardais mon chien qui ã©tait sur le gazon en avant de la maison et juste devant ã  150-200 pieds, je vois ã§a apparaã®tre. ã‡a durait 5 secs et ã§a parti tout doucement. j'ai fait ma petite enquãªte et je pensais ã  un gamin qui s'amusait avec un flash lite mais ce n'ã©tait pas le cas. un rã©flecteur de voiture mais pas de voiture. juste du gazon et des cã¨dres.

samedi. je regardais la tv avec ma femme dans la salle ã  dã®ner et ã  ma droite j'ai senti une lumiã¨re blanche sur le cã´tã© droit de mon visage, je me suis retournã© aussi tã´t. dans la cuisine il y a la fenãªtre au dessus du lavabo qui donne dans la cour arriã¨re. j'ai vu encore la lumiã¨re. ma femme ã©tait assise ã  cã´tã© de moi et elle n'a rien vu. ã‡a ã©clairait comme un flash lite trã¨s puissante mais je n'ã©tais pas aveuglã© et aucun reflet comme fait un flash lite. la lumiã¨re ã©tait de la mãªme grosseur que la veille mais blanche au centre et rouge rose a l'extã©rieurs je suis allã© voire dehors et rien. le lendemain, je me suis assis au mãªme endroit pour vã©rifier l'angle de vu du phã©nomã¨ne et cela donne dans les arbres du voisin juste au-dessus du cabanon ã  environ 12 ã  15 pieds de haut. ã‡a durait encore 5 secs et sa partie tout doucement. comme s'il y aurait eu un dimer sur la lumiã¨re... je sais par c est quoi. ã‡a m'intrigue ã©normã©ment. je ne suis pas alcoolique et je ne prends pas de drogue ni mã©dicament et ne souffre d'aucune maladie cornique.
content.summary: Lumiere rouge fixe qui disparaã®t lentement

content.detailedDescription: Well i was saying goodbye to my girlfriend and as i walked outside because she said to feel how cold it was. i looked up into the sky to see a bright light in between the stars above head thinking that it was a star i brushed it away and then as soon as i was about to look away it started heading north turned around and headed south. my girlfriend did not witness it and dose not believe me.
content.summary: I walked outside and was looking at sky and saw a bright light turn and then disappear

content.detailedDescription: I smoke outside numerous times a day and at night. i have seen meteors before but never have seen anything moving at this height at this rate of speed. the object appeared significantly higher than a commercial jet and traveled further and faster than any meteor that i have ever seen in my life. it almost appeared to be moving in an arc around the circumference of the earth and travel a great distance in just a second or two before i lost site of it.
content.summary: I was outside looking at the stars when i observed a distant light moving at a very high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: I was at a family trip in southern michigan when i go outside to pick up some garbage. i see some form of bright light and at first it just sat on the water. then it darted back and forth several times on the water. then all of sudden it just shot up and disappeared.
content.summary: I was at a family trip in michigan where’s i saw bright light hover and float about 100 feet away from me

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was working security in san rafael with clearview of the sky above the bay. turn 3 hour. i witnessed approximately 100 planes landing and taking off from sfo area except for 1. at first it looked just like a star but as a plane approached it it lazily drifted more to the west from my perspective out of the plains way or something. and then stays put flashing brilliantly then going dull for short. then with a bright flash comes back into view. i walked away for about 5 minutes while working came back to look at it and it was moving very obviously to the south west. as i'm speaking it is drifting back to the east. it only seems to move larger distances when other planes are in vicinity. seems very observatory. i'm currently watching it still nothing else about it to report
content.summary: Area above sfbay amongst sfo flight paths.  only moves when planes start to fly near

content.detailedDescription: i was a loadmaster on an c-141 transport aircraft we took off from charleston afb going to dover afb delaware when we pick up an object on radar the object was pacing our aircraft we reported the incident to the tower they also saw the object. but said we may have a problem with our radar. once we landed at dover afb the techs checked out the radar on the aircraft and found no problems. we then took off from dover afb heading to ireland half way across the atlantic ocean the object returned and continue to paced us the rest of the way across the ocean. we once again contacted the tower to report the incident and the tower confirm that they also has the object on radar. at this we were asked if the crew wanted to file a ufo report, we discuss it as a crew and decided it would be bad for our careers so no report was filed.
content.summary: I was a loadmaster on a c-141 transport aircraft we left charleston afb and was paced by ufo  to dover afb.

content.detailedDescription: in april 1972 my mother, brother, and my self were sitting in the living room when an burnt orange sphere enter through the living room window. i was standing in the center of the living room when the object went around and up and down me about three or four times and then exit through the front door.My mother did not see the orb but my brother did. in which at that point he believe me from when i told him about the craft i has seen in early february 1972.
content.summary: Orb enter though living room window went up and down and around me then exit out through the front door.

content.detailedDescription: i left my house by the back door to go to my friend house he lived on the next row house from mine. as i cut though the back yard there was some light  i looked to my right and at tree top high i saw a cigar shaped craft hovering over the top of the trees where we (kids) played football. it was a red orange in color and made no sound. i remember standing there looking at it and then there was noting. the next thing i remember was beating on my friend door. my friend answer the door and we went up stair to his room some of my other friends were there. they all stated that i was a few hours late. i do not know how that happen.
content.summary: Going to friend house saw object hovering over trees in backyard only remember getting to my friend house and was told i was two hours late

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to my front door deck to have a smoke at 7:10 pm on dec 26, 2017. while smoking i was star gazing & looked to the north when a triangular 
shape craft with rectangular dull lights at each point moved quickly with out any noise in a southern direction. the entire sighting lasted above 2-3 sec. i ran back into the house to tell my daughter & came back out to see if it would return, but we haven't seen it since
content.summary: I was star gazing when i noticed the movement of a triangluar shape craft

content.detailedDescription: During the last week of september, i went to let the dog out in the backyard at about 1:30am. after being out there for a minute or two i heard a noise. when i looked up, i saw an object in the sky. it had four bright, white lights, and one red light. the lights were all steady. the noise it made was like a loud roaring noise. it came from over my neighbor's house and glided over my house at a very low altitude. as it went away from me, the noise it made began pulsating as it went out of sight. it never changed altitude the duration i observed. it lasted just over a minute or so. there are a lot of military and commercial aircraft in this area, but i have never seen or heard anything that compares with this event.
content.summary: Unknown object observed one night in september. four bright white lights and one red light at a low altitude.

content.detailedDescription: At around 10:30 pm on christmas night, i stepped out to my balcony and noticed an extremely bright light in the sky. now, at first, i thought it may be a plane or a helicopter, but this thing didn't move not one bit. its light that it was emitting stayed shining at the same level the entire time. this object didn't have any flashing lights or make a sound, but what was strange was that their was another object at a distance with a bright pulsating light sitting still in the sky, as if it were observing this bright object.  after about an hour three orange lights appeared around the bright object forming into a triangular shape beside the bright object and eventually disappeared, but the bright object remained. eventually, i went inside and went to my room for about an hour and decided to see if it was still out there, and to my amazement the bright object was still out in the night sky in the same exact place with the same light intensity and even the object, that i assume was observing it, was still their as well. for the duration, i am not sure. when i stepped out, the object was already there and i stood outside for a little over an hour and then went inside for about an hour. after being inside i went back out to check and the object still remained in the sky. i am not sure what this is and i am reporting this because, i go out to my balcony every single night and never saw anything like this. i see planes and helicopter flying by, but this was way too weird for me to ignore it.
content.summary: Bright light hovering for hours with an object at a distance with an intense pulsating light observing the bright object.
